FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure E-1 parameters. E-1 is a basic time division multiplexing scheme used to carry digital circuits. It is also a standard WAN digital communication format designed to operate over copper facilities at a rate of 2.048 Mb/s.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the E-1 channel being created. Values-E1: 1 to 21, e1-sonet-sdh-index.
